body.p: The Quick Fix support helps you resolve missing target reference errors that may occur when developing Ant build documents.

To activate the feature, when finds a validation error in an Ant build place the caret in the highlighted area of text. If can provide a quick fix for that error, the icon is displayed in the left side stripe. When you click this icon, the list of available fixes is displayed. Also, you can invoke the quick fix menu by pressing Alt + 1 (Meta + Alt + 1 on Mac OS X) on your keyboard.

provides the following quick fixes:
Create new target - Creates a new target with the specified name.
Change reference to "targetName" - Corrects the reference to point to an already defined target.
Remove target reference - Removes the erroneous reference.
